dialogue_lines: I can't believe we're presenting today. My stomach is already doing flips.
You've got this. Besides, we rehearsed like five times.
Yeah, but what if the projector fails? Or I blank out?
Then I'll jump in and distract them with my charm. Obviously.
Relax. Once we get coffee, your whole vibe will reset.
choice_sets: Ask Anja what coffee she's getting
Say you can't wait to be done for the day.
Text Sanja and Eva to save you a seat
Take a deep breath and focus
Start a gossip session to distract.
Ask to rehearse one more time
response_dialogue: Wait—what are you ordering? I need to copy a good one.
Caramel macchiato. Don’t copy me, make your own personality.
Hold up—let me check if I even brought my USB...
Girl if you forgot it again I swear—
I can't wait to be done for the day it's exhausting.
No seriously, after this I’m disappearing until Monday.
Sanja said they will be a little late so Tina will save for all of us haha. Classic
In... two... one... okay. you should be a little grounded now .
Okay.. that might have helped a little.
See? All you needed was a tiny dramatic countdown.
Oh by the way I heard that you know who started seeing...
YOU ARE NOT CHANGING THE TOPIC NOW
I feel pretty confident right now.
Well good for you I feel like I’m gonna be sick
Let's do a practice presentation right now.
Alright. Let’s do a speed run. No stutters.
Speed and power. Like Lightning McQueen.
Let’s just vibe. We got this.
